text: Joseph Boleslaw Szura (December 18, 1938 – October 13, 2006) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward who played 90 games in the National Hockey League for the California Golden Seals and 115 games in the World Hockey Association for the Los Angeles Sharks and Houston Aeros. Szura was born in Fort William, Ontario. ==Other websites== * *Notice of death Category:1938 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Baltimore Clippers players Category:Buffalo Bisons (AHL) players Category:California Golden Seals players Category:Canadian ice hockey forwards Category:Cleveland Barons (1937–1973) players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Providence Reds players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Ice hockey centres
title: Joe Szura
